effects.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.  Frozen Pok√©mon may use this move, in which case they will thaw.
effects.shortEffect: User takes 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.

moveDescription:
The user cloaks itself in fire and charges the target.
This also damages the user quite a lot. This attack
may leave the target with a burn.
